title: Construction Yard Sound Effect Pack
description: This sound library has collected more than 90 minutes of construction sounds that include jackhammer, excavator sounds and background atmospheres.
longDescription:
Noisy demolitions and constructions belong to a multitude of urban sounds and they are part of our everyday lives.

This sound library has collected more than 90 minutes of construction sounds that include jackhammer, excavator sounds and background atmospheres.


Construction machinery and construction or demolition sites always produce interesting and varied sounds and can be used in a wide range of productions. That’s why I made a package like this one, recorded on real construction sites.


This sound effect collection is ideal for use in game software, applications, commercials, movies, TV shows,

videos, animation, and any other entertainment industry where a high-quality audio effect is essential.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  105 Construction Yard sound effect.
  • For productions where construction area scenes appear.  

Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: One shot and Loop sounds

Minutes of audio provided: 01hr 33min 15sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/deb-sound-com/construction-yard-vol1-demo
